channel.title: SQL on Muggle L
channel.description: Recent content in SQL on Muggle L

item.title: 🥊SQL 拾遗
item.description: 大纲 MySQL 创建数据库 MySQL 用户管理 MySQL CURD MySQL 事务 MySQL 引擎 其他与补充 Docker 创建数据库 docker run -d --name=mysql5.7 -p 3307:3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=liu12134 mysql:5.7 #mysql 创建数据库 //TODO MYSQL 默认编码与UTF8、UTF8MB4的区别 MySQL 默认编码 在 MYSQL 8.0 以上 默认编码为 UTF8MB4 mysql> show variables like '%char%'; +--------------------------+--------------------------------+ | Variable_name | Value | +--------------------------+--------------------------------+ | character_set_client | latin1 | | character_set_connection | latin1 | | character_set_database | utf8mb4 | | character_set_filesystem | binary | | character_set_results | latin1 | | character_set_server | utf8mb4 | | character_set_system | utf8 | | character_sets_dir | /usr/share/mysql-8.

item.title: 📈数据库连接的图表展示
item.description: 图片来源 http://www.postgresqltutorial.com inner join left join where left is null right join right is null full join right is null of left is null cross join summary
